div.p:
Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xiijo die mensis
Decembris anno quo supra

The said day Alexander hay tuk to preiwe that he pait William' boll
skippar for ane pettiquartar of salt

The said day James colisone tuk to preiwe sufficiently that gelis
allirdes set to him ane thrid partis fisching of the pot ay and
quhile hir husband and sche cum and' occupy the samyn one friday
that nixt cummis

The said day the prouest and bailyes assignit friday that nixt cummis
to James colisone and Isabell crichtone to compeir befor thame and
pay thar male and gressome of thar fischingis of Done eftir the
tenour of the generale assedacioun'

The said day court wardit schew for law and it was gevin for Dome
that Alexander hay burges of the said burgh' has failyet in his preiwe
anent the pament of ane petiquartar of sale that he tuk to preiw pait to William
boll quhilk salt he ressauit fra William abirdour clerk of the schip
and awe to pay the samyne ande that was gevin for dome

The said day it was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' Williame still
forspekar that robert murray pinor sale pay v s' to meg hill of hir
hous' maile Incontinent

The said day It was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' Alexander
gray forspekar that gif patry chirnsid' be fund awing
ony money to Androw cullan thai cane nocht acquit him of the
tribulance of the said androw and' gif it be fund that the
said patry awe nay money to the said androw he is quyt
of ale tribulance of the said androw

Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
decimo sexto die mensis Decembris anno quo supra

The said day the wif of Alexander burnat was in ane amerciament
of the court be hir avin toung graunt for the selling of xij d'
aill and' to amend as law wile and' forbeir in tyme to cum
and that was gevin for dome

The said day Katherine vrchauld was conuict be ane suorne
assis' thomas lesly forspekar for the breking of commone
ordinance in selling of xij d' aile aganis the statutis of
the toune for the quhilk sche was in ane amerciament of
the court et cetera

The said day marioin rannald was conuict' be ane suorn'
assis' thomas lesly forspekar for the breking of common'
statutis of the toun' in bying of mair male nay an laid
in ane day

The said day It was appontit betuix the prouest bailyeis ande consale
one that ane part And Johne fendour wricht one that vthir part in maner
forme and effect eftir follouing that is to say the said Johnne sale god'
willing big oupmak and finaly end and complet the xxxiiij stallis in that
queir with the spiris and the chanslar dur and ale vthir thingis according
tharto one his avin expens' als' substantiusly and honerable as he may as
thai ar begunnyne and bettir gif he cane betuix this and the fest of sanct
petyr callit lammes Inmediat heireftir following or at the fest of sanct
michaell nixt and Inmediat thareftir follouing at the ferrast quhilk
being completit and' finaly endit at the said day as said is the pro
uest bailyes and consale sale content and' pay to the said Johnne tua
hundretht pundis vsusale money of scotland with ane bontay accor
ding to thair honor And' gif he completis nocht the said wark be the sad'
day thane thai sale content and pay to him the some contenit in the
first contrak And this condicioun' making nay dirogacioun' to the
first contrak To the keping of the quhilkis the said Johne oblist
him be the faitht of his bodie to gilbert menyeis prouest in the tovnis
nam' And' ale somes of money that he ressauis salbe allouit in'
the said Some et cetera

Curia Balliuorum burgj de Abidene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
decimo septimo die mensis Decembris anno quo supra

The said day the Alderman in the name of the haill toune assignit
marrowschip tile alexander malisone tile his half third part of
Done eftir the tenour of the generale assedacioun' and the said alexander
protestit that gif he gat nay marrowschip that he mycht strek ane
haill neth'

The said day Androw cullane grantit that he ressauit maile and
gressome fra gelis allirdes for ane thridpart of the pot quhilk
some of maile and girssome extendis to iij pundis vj s' and vij d'
quhilk maile and girssome he ressauit fray the said gelis
and nane vtheris

The said day the court wardit schew for law and it was gevin
fordome that James colisone hed failyet in his preiwe of ane
thirdpartis fisching of ane netht of the pot allegijt set to
him be gelis allirdes and the said gelis tile haue free dispo
sicioun' of hir said fischinigis

The said day It was deliuerit be ane suorne Williame still
was conuict' be ane suorne assis' Johnne of cullane forspekar
for the tribulance of Isabell cullane for the quhilk he
was in ane amerciament of the court et cetera And that he sale reform'
and mak the hous quhilk he has in tak of the said Isabell
als gud and in siclik fasone at his furthtpassing as at his
entiras' tharto And' the said William sal pay his maile to the
said Isabell one monunday that nixt cummis and' quhat that
he cane preiw that he disponit apon' the said hous' at the
said Isabellis command' to be allouit in the said maile And'
atour gif euire the said William in tyme to cum happinis' to
tribull the said Isabell or ony vthir persone famous and beis conuict'
tharof sale pay fourty s' to sanct nicholes wark vneforgevin

The said day Johnne cuk tuk to preiwe one monunday that
nixt cummis sufficiently that robert Waus suld haue deliuerit
to him ane hundretht thraif of fodir and' ane chalder of aitis
betuix michaelmes bigane and yuyle nixt thareftir

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xviijo
die Decembris anno quo supra

The said day at the Request of Isabell of crichtoune and for vnite
and concord to be hede ymang nichtbouris of the toune the aldirman balyeis
and e the Counsale present fot eht eyme gauntit and consentit that the
saide Isabele and patry chernside sale bruk and Joys' the fischingis one
the wattir of Done Set to hir' in the last generale assedacioun' of the saide
burghe that is to say ane thridpart of ane nethis fischingis ane yer' and half
ane nethis fischingis ane vthir equalie betuix thame and James Colisone
and the last yer' the thridpart and half nethis equalie betuix thame for the
termes of the generale assedacioun' forsaide but ony preiudice skatht or diro
gacioun' of the samyn Ande that ane lettir salbe maide vndir that commone
Seile to the saidez Isabele and patry of the saide fischingis for the termes
of the saide assedacioun' at my lordis of Abirdenis hame Cumyn' at the
avys' of his lordschipe but preiudice breking or dirogacioun' of the said'
assedacioun' vpon' the quhilkis Androw elphinstone of Selmys askit Instrument
befor matir henry Spittale patry levinstone ser thomas Wricht and Johne
of Cochrane

tribull the said Isabell or ony vthir persoun' famous ande beis conuict tharof sale pay fourty
s' to Sanct Nicholes wark vneforgevin

The said day Johnne cuk touk to preiwe one monunday that nixt cummis sufficiently
that robert Waus sulde haue deliuerit to him ane hundrath' thraif of fodir ande
ane chalder of aitis betuix michealmes bigane ande yuyle nixt thareftir

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene Tenta In pretorio eiusdem xviijo die Decem
bris Anno quo supra

The said day at the Request of crichtone and for vnite ande concord to be
hede ymang nichtbouris of the toune the alderman bailyes ande the counsale present
for the tyme grauntit ande consentit that the said Isabell ande patry chernsid'
sale bruk ande vys' the fischingis one the wattir of Done Set to hir' in the last
generale assedacioun' of the said burgh' that is to say ane thridpart' of ane nethis
fischinigis ane yer' and half ane nethis fischingis ane vthir equalie betuix
thame for the termes of the general assedacioun' forsaide but ony presiudice skatht
or dirogacioun' of the samyne Ande that ane lettir salbe maide vnder thar commone
Seill to the saidez Isabell ande patry of the saide fischingis for the termes
of the said assedacioun' at my lordis of Abirdenis hame cumyne at the awis'
of his lordschip but preiudice breking or dirogacioun' of the saide assedacioun
vpoun' the quhilkis Androw elphinstoun' of Selmis askit instrument befor mastir
henry Spittale patry levinstone ser thomas Wricht and Johnne of cochrane

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem vicesimo die mensis
Decembris anno quo supra et cetera

The said day the alderman bailyes counsaile and communite of the said burgh warnit be
the hand' bell gatherit and circualy Inquerit be the officiaris grantit consentit
and ordanit for cessing of tribull Inquietacioun' of the toune for vnite and concord
to be had' and perseuerit that Dauid colp sale haue ane half nethis fischingis
of the mydchingile one that watir of Dee for ale the termes of fiwe yeris to
be runnyne nixt and' Inmediat eftir this general assedacioun' of the said burgh'
Instant be finaly endit he payand' siclik maile girssome and dewiteis as vthiris
nichtbouris pais for siclik takis And chesit thir personis gilbert menyeis prouest
Dauid menyeis ser Johnne' rudirfurd knicht Johnne' of cullane and androwe
cullane commissaris to set the said half neth' fisching to the said Dauid'
for ale the termes of fiwe yeris and' ordanit ane commissioun' and' ane
assedacioun' to be maid tharupone indurand the said' termes selit vnder thar
commone seill in dew forme as efferis and' ordanit the keparis of the common'
seill to seill the samyn for

The said day the alderman bailyeis counsaile and takis men of the said
burgh consentit statut and ordanit for the pament of thre barrellis of sal
mond yerly to Dauid colp for the termes of fiwe yeris Indurand this generale
assedacioun' instant that the possessouris Joisaris of Ilkane half nethe of
the raik sale pay yerly four schillingis tharof four s' now in hand and'
yerly iiij s' witht thair maile indurand the said fiwe yeris the brukaris
of Ilkane half nethis fischinig of the mydchingill xxxj pennys in hand'
and' xxxj pannis yerly witht thair maile The Joisaris and' brukaris
of Ilkane half nethe fisching of the pot tua s' in hand' and' yerly
tua s' with thar maile Ilkane half of nethe of the furdis sexten' pennis
in hand' and' yerly xvj d' witht thar maile Induring the said'
fiwe yeris The ioisaris and' brukaris of Ilkane half nethis fisching
of Done four schillingis in hand' and' iiij s' yerly witht thair maile
Induring the said' fiwe yeris Ilkane sextpart of the crovis tua s' in hand'
and yerly tua s' witht thair maile Induring the said' fiwe yeris

The said day the bailyes and' counsaile assignit the male of the half neth'
fisching of the Raik quhilkis thomas chamer brukis to gilbert menyeis prouest
for the pament of the thre barrell of salmond' to Dauid colp becaus'
the said gilbert is bundin for the pament of the samyne to the said Dauid'

The said day the broustaris of the said burgh' generaly was accusit for the
pontis eftir writin that in the first for spilling of mercat befor tyme of day
Item for selling of aill or it be cunnit Item for selling of aill darrer than it
is set be the cunnaris Item for brekyn of common ordinance for selling of xij d' aile
Item for howsin of wittale or it be present to the mercat Item for denying of aile to the
cunnaris Item for halding of witall fra the mercat Item for selling of aile witht
pontis one signit with the common stampe and met with the Inggale quhilkis
denyit and thareftir the said actionis and acquisaciounis was put to the
decisioun' of ane assis' quhilkis riply auisit fand' and deliuerit that thai
coud nocht acquyt canny Waus male Kintor the wif of alexander talyour the
wedew of richerd' Waus the wif of george barbour the wedew of Johne
stevinsone eldar margaret litstar Katherine Wrquhart the wif of William
stile the wif of androw nachtj the wif of William bilty the wedew of William
ranesone the wif of sande brabnar the wif of Johne' ramsay the wif
of Johne of murray the wif of Johne frostar the wif of Jame strathachin
the wif of thomas riddall the wif of patrik red' the wif of cristofer
prat the wif of mastir James cuming the wif of androw louson' the wif
of alexander burnat the wif of gilbert prestone the wif of mathow
branche the wif of alexander malisone the wif of androw Wilyeamsone
seruand' of gilbert litstar the wif of alexander horne the wif of thomas
lamyntone the wif of alexander blaer the wif of William rolland' and the
the wif of Johne cuk wif of androw steuart for brekyne of common' ordinance in selling of xij
d' aile agane the statutis of the towne for the quhilkis Ilkane of thame
was in ane amerciament of the court et cetera Item thai coud nocht acquyt the
remanent of the broustaris of the pontis forsaid' eftir the tenor of the tone
officiaris billis as in the samyne mair fullely is contenit'
